item.title: ‘I can’t deal with managing them’: I juggle 18 credit cards. How do I close them without ruining my credit score?
item.description: “I have very high limits, so charges barely make a blip on my credit-utilization ratio.”

item.title: ‘My house is paid off’: How do I ensure my son-in-law never gets my money — even if my daughter dies before he does?
item.description: “I would like it to go to only my daughter and grandchildren.”

item.title: ‘I already have my ticket.’ These celebrities want to leave the U.S. with Trump as president
item.description: Plenty of celebrities are vowing to move out of the U.S. rather than remain while Trump serves as the 47th president.

item.title: This neglected issue is a workplace productivity and talent retention threat that demands C-suite attention
item.description: Eldercare benefits aren’t just a nice perk. They’re essential to solving this $33 billion productivity problem.

item.title: Amazon is beating other retailers on price, but here’s how you can beat Amazon
item.description: Bargain hunters are taking advantage of rebate platforms to bring costs down.
